summary: Tested P0 features: Responsive Navigation, Gallery Slider, Weekly Agenda, Logo Display. All 9 backend tests pass. Desktop navigation shows all 5 menu items (Home, Agenda, Ramadan, Informasi, Tentang Kami). Mobile view correctly hides desktop nav and shows burger menu. Mobile sidebar opens with all navigation links. Logo now uses mosqueIdentity.logo_url from API (currently null, shows 'M' placeholder). Gallery and Weekly Agenda sections conditionally render based on data availability.

issues: Minor: Console warning about missing Description for DialogContent - accessibility improvement suggested

passed_tests: Backend: /api/health returns status=healthy
Backend: /api/mosque/identity returns mosque data with logo_url field
Backend: /api/gallery returns empty list (no gallery data)
Backend: /api/gallery?active_only=true returns empty list
Backend: /api/agenda returns empty list (no agenda data)
Backend: /api/agenda?active_only=true&upcoming_only=true returns empty list
Backend: /api/prayer-times returns prayer times (Subuh 04:32, etc.)
Backend: /api/zis/summary returns monthly ZIS summary
Backend: /api/quotes/random returns quote API works
Frontend: Homepage loads with data-testid='homepage-new'
Frontend: Desktop navigation bar visible with all 5 nav links
Frontend: Mobile burger menu button is hidden on desktop
Frontend: Mobile burger menu button is visible on mobile viewport (390x844)
Frontend: Mobile sidebar opens showing all 5 navigation links
Frontend: Navigation to /homepage/agenda works from mobile menu
Frontend: AboutPage uses WebsiteNavigation component correctly
Frontend: AgendaPage uses WebsiteNavigation component correctly
Frontend: InformasiPage uses WebsiteNavigation component correctly
Frontend: Footer bank account 7148254552 displayed on all pages
Frontend: Prayer times bar displays correctly on homepage
critical_code_review_comments: Navigation implementation is correct - responsive breakpoint at md (768px)
Logo display uses mosqueIdentity.logo_url correctly - shows placeholder if null
Gallery and Weekly Agenda sections have proper conditional rendering (only show when data exists)
WebsiteNavigation component is shared across AboutPage, AgendaPage, InformasiPage
Minor: Add aria-describedby to SheetContent for better accessibility
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - Gallery and Agenda APIs return empty lists as expected

mocked_apis_note.note: All APIs are real - Gallery and Agenda show 'no data' state correctly when database is empty

context_for_next_testing_agent: P0 features complete: 1) Responsive Navigation with Sheet component (burger menu for mobile <768px), 2) Logo uses mosqueIdentity.logo_url from /api/mosque/identity, 3) Gallery slider (Carousel component) only renders when gallery data exists, 4) Weekly Agenda only renders when agenda data exists within 7 days. All website pages use shared WebsiteNavigation and WebsiteFooter components. To test with data, admin can add gallery items via /connect/gallery and agenda via dashboard.
